subject: Don't miss this approval  Tue, 08 May 2007 13:58:57 -0500
body:
Dear Home-0wner 

Still paying too much for your mortgage?  Refinance us lowest rate.  Your loan has been approved.

You can receive $290,000 for
$589 per month save 41%.

Please respond T0day. 
http://ilook.tw/ihb17

Gabrielle Merrill
LendingTree Department


"When nothing seems to help, I go and look at a stonecutter hammering away at his rock perhaps a hundred times without as much as a crack showing in it. Yet at the hundred and first blow it will split in two, and I know it was not that blow that did it, but all that had gone before."  -- Jacob August Riis
